name: Hungry Bunny (itch)
description:
A game of hungry bunnies trying to eat the falling fruit and vegetables from the trees. Yes, this tree grows carrots.

Winning Conditions

Eat the most fruits/vegetables.

Fruit Worth

  • Carrots: 100pts.
  • Apple: 200pts.
  • Orange: 300pts.

Controls

  • Keyboard: arrow keys to move, spacebar to jump, enter key to play again.
